mapper.sql: t_tenant_user.id , t_tenant_user.name, t_tenant_user.check_in AS checkIn, t_tenant_user.occupancy_days AS occupancyDays, t_tenant_user.room_number AS roomNumber, t_tenant_user.org_id AS orgId

SELECT children.id FROM t_sys_org, t_sys_org as children WHERE t_sys_org.left_num <= children.left_num AND t_sys_org.right_num >= children.left_num and t_sys_org.id = #{record.orgId} order by t_sys_org.node_level ASC
mapper.select: SELECT t_tenant_user.* FROM t_tenant_user WHERE t_tenant_user.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_tenant_user.id

SELECT
FROM t_tenant_user
,() AS ownedOrgIds
WHERE 1=1
AND t_tenant_user.org_id = ownedOrgIds.id
AND t_tenant_user.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_tenant_user.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.name},'%')
AND t_tenant_user.check_in LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.checkIn},'%')
AND t_tenant_user.occupancy_days LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.occupancyDays},'%')
AND t_tenant_user.room_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.roomNumber},'%')
AND t_tenant_user.org_id IN ()
